identified-content.classifier: Top/Classifieds/Job Market/Job Categories/Sales and Business Development

block.p: In the following reports, the "listed at" price is the asking price when negotiations began that ended in the sale. Time on market is from most recent listing to contract. MANHATTAN
GREENWICH VILLAGE $395,000

165 Perry Street 2-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,600-sq.-ft. co-op in a loft building; 12-ft. ceilings, exposed-brick walls, south exposure; maintenance $1,010, 60% tax-deductible, listed at $425,000, 1 week on market (Broker: Debra Kameros Co.)
In the following reports, the "listed at" price is the asking price when negotiations began that ended in the sale. Time on market is from most recent listing to contract. MANHATTAN
GREENWICH VILLAGE $395,000

165 Perry Street 2-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,600-sq.-ft. co-op in a loft building; 12-ft. ceilings, exposed-brick walls, south exposure; maintenance $1,010, 60% tax-deductible, listed at $425,000, 1 week on market (Broker: Debra Kameros Co.)
TRIBECA $515,000

41 Worth Street 2-bedroom, 1-bath, 2,300-sq.-ft. co-op in a loft building; elevator, arched windows, 13-ft. ceilings, exposed-brick walls, skylights, 2 exposures; maintenance $1,014, 50% tax deductible, listed at $529,000, 26 weeks on market (Broker: Bascom & Sears) UPPER EAST SIDE $1.105 million

200 East 69th Street (Trump Palace) 3-bedroom, 3 1/2-bath, 1,957-sq.-ft. condo in a 4-year-old building; 24-hr. doorman, concierge, dining room, balcony, 3 exposures; common charge $1,457, taxes $11,640 (Broker: Corcoran Group) UPPER WEST SIDE $310,000

345 West 88th Street 2-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,500-sq.-ft. prewar co-op; part-time doorman, eat-in kitchen, new windows, Hudson River view; maintenance $946, 40% tax deductible, listed at $330,000, 1 1/2 years on market (Broker: Greenthal West Residential Sales) BRONX
CITY ISLAND $250,000

550 Minneford Avenue 6-bedroom, 2-bath, 80-year-old detached Victorian; dining room, family room, finished basement, 2-car garage, 50- by 100-ft. lot; taxes $2,200, listed at $265,000, 1 week on market (Broker: Jacqueline Kyle Kall) RIVERDALE $95,000

3875 Waldo Avenue 2-bedroom, 1 1/2-bath, 1,000-sq.-ft. co-op in a prewar building; dining area, new windows; maintenance $577, 45% tax deductible, listed at $115,000, 12 weeks on market (Broker: ERA/ Susan Goldy & Co. Realtors) BROOKLYN
BROOKLYN HEIGHTS $580,000

1 Grace Court 3-bedroom, 2-bath, 2,500-sq.-ft. co-op in a prewar building; 2 maids' rooms, dining room, eat-in kitchen, landmark district, harbor view; maintenance $1,575, 60% tax deductible, listed at $625,000, 17 weeks on market (Broker: Harborview Realty) DITMAS PARK AREA $265,000

804 Glenwood Road 7-bedroom, 3-bath, renovated Victorian; dining room, eat-in kitchen, fireplace, Jacuzzi, private driveway, 50- by 100-ft. lot; taxes $2,700, listed at $335,000, 44 weeks on market (Broker: Wilk Real Estate) PARK SLOPE $445,000

491 Eighth Street 6-bedroom, 4-bath, 2-family, 4-story brownstone to be used as a one-family residence; eat-in kitchen, dining room, laundry room, rear garden; taxes $1,750. listed at $479,000, 13 weeks on market (Broker: Brooklyn Properties of 7th Avenue) SHEEPSHEAD BAY $233,000

2426 East 26th Street 2-family, 50-year-old semi-attached brick house; 3 bedrooms in primary unit; 2 bedrooms in other; dining room, eat-in kitchen, 1 bath in each; 1-car garage; taxes $1,900, listed at $254,000, 4 weeks on market (Broker: Homes 'R Beautiful) QUEENS
ELMHURST $178,000

94-17 55th Avenue 3-bedroom, 1-bath, 55-year-old detached frame house; dining room, eat-in kitchen, 2-car garage, 30- by 100-ft. lot; taxes $1,000, listed at $189,000, 26 weeks on market (Broker: Veterans Realty) FOREST HILLS GARDENS $775,000

2 Greenway South 5-bedroom, 4 1/2-bath, 65-year-old center-hall brick colonial; dining room, family room, powder room, 2 fireplaces; 1-bedroom, 1-bath apartment over garage, 106- by 66-ft. lot; taxes $5,000, listed at $875,000, 7 weeks on market (Broker: Madeleine Realty)
STATEN ISLAND
ELTINGVILLE 219,900

166-B Figurea Avenue 2-family, semi-attached new aluminum-sided and brick house; 3 bedrooms, 2 1/2 baths, dining room, eat-in kitchen, family room in primary unit; 1 bedroom, 1 bath in basement; taxes $460, listed at $219,900, 4 weeks on market (Broker: Linda Nasta Realtor Ltd.) NEW JERSEY
HASBROUCK HEIGHTS $218,000

415 Terrace Avenue 2-family, 3-story, 55-year-old Victorian; 4-bedroom, 1 1/2-bath unit on upper 2 floors; 1 bedroom, 1 bath on ground floor; 2-car garage; taxes $5,136, listed at $229,500, 11 weeks on market (Brokers: Prudential Higgins Realtors; Century 21 Eudan Realty) MONROE $153,500
27 First Avenue 3-bedroom, 2-bath, 24-year-old ranch; c/a, skylights, bay windows; taxes $2,862, listed at $164,900, 4 weeks on market (Broker: Weichert Realtors) OCEAN CITY $372,000

1330 Ocean Avenue New 2-story, 2-family house; 3 bedrooms, 2 baths on each floor; across the street from beach and boardwalk, wraparound decks; taxes $2,800, listed at $372,000, 12 weeks on market (Broker: The Richards Agency)
RANDOLPH $325,000

14 Georgian Road 5-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 5-year-old colonial; family room with fireplace, deck, 2-car garage; taxes $7,200, listed at $345,000, 9 weeks on market (Brokers: The Prudential New Jersey Realty; Century 21/Joe Tekula) LONG ISLAND SEA CLIFF $192,500
127 Brown Street 3-bedroom, 1 1/2-bath, 90-year-old Victorian; covered porch; taxes $1,700, listed at $229,000, 15 weeks on market (Broker: Harmonious Homes) FARMINGDALE $163,000

4 Hynes Court 3-bedroom, 1 1/2-bath, new ranch; dining room, basement, 1-car garage; estimated taxes $5,000, listed at $169,990, 4 weeks on market (Broker: A-1 Realty Network of Homes) GLEN COVE $220,000

112 Dosoris Lane 3-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 39-year-old split level; den, finished basement, patio, 2-car garage; taxes $5,500, listed at $235,000, 11 weeks on market (Brokers: Coldwell Banker Sammis; Daniel Gale Associates) JERICHO $195,000

60 Narcissus Drive 3-bedroom, 1 1/2-bath, 35-year-old split level; dining room, eat-in kitchen, deck, one-car garage; taxes $3,700, listed at $224,900, 12 weeks on market (Broker: ERA Gatewood Realty) WESTCHESTER
BEDFORD $1.15 million

81 Stone Hill Road 7-bedroom, 6 1/2-bath, 181-year-old colonial; pool, tennis court, 6.9 acres; taxes $16,132, listed at $1.395 million, 1 year on market (Brokers: Coldwell Banker; Randolph Properties) CORTLANDT $160,000

8 Abraham Gunn Memorial Drive 4-bedroom, 2-bath, 22-year-old colonial; dining room, family room, cul-de-sac; taxes $4,376, listed at $174,900, 2 years on market (Brokers: Coldwell Banker; Weichert Realtors)
MOUNT VERNON $270,000

332 East Grand Street 6-bedroom, 3 1/2-bath, 66-year-old Tudor; h/w floors, greenhouse breakfast room, fireplace, French doors, terrace; taxes $6,489, listed at $274,000, 8 months on market (Broker: Lindsey Real Estate) YONKERS $48,000

804 Bronx River Road 2-bedroom, 1-bath, 60-year-old co-op; h/w floors, remodeled kitchen, 900 square feet; maintenance $547, 51 percent tax deductible, listed at $55,000, 3 months on market (Broker: Charles G. Brophy & Associates) CONNECTICUT
DARIEN $1.909 million

18 Arrowhead Way 6-bedroom, 4 1/2-bath, 240-year-old colonial; marble master bath, c/a, terrace, new roof, fireplace, finished basement, 3-car garage, 2.6-acre lot; taxes $11,599, listed at $2.185 million, 8 weeks on market (Brokers: Preferred Properties Inc.; Kelly & Associates) OLD GREENWICH $805,000

44 Wesskun Wood Road 6-bedroom, 4 1/2-bath, 30-year-old colonial; dining room, eat-in kitchen, sauna, c/a, terrace, 2 family rooms, 2-car garage, 0.5-acre lot; taxes $7,336, listed at $829,000, 3 weeks on market (Broker: William Pitt Real Estate) RIDGEFIELD $60,000

2 Quince Court (Fox Hill) 1-bedroom, 1-bath, 810-sq.-ft. condo in a 20-year-old building; playroom, pool, clubhouse; $263 common charge includes heat and hot water; taxes $1,905, listed at $64,900, 10 weeks on market (William Pitt Real Estate) WESTON $340,000

82 Little Fox Lane 4-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 33-year-old Cape Cod; dining room, eat-in kitchen, finished basement, 2-car garage, 2.19-acre lot; taxes $3,844, listed at $365,000, 12 weeks on market (Broker: William Raveis Real Estate)
